text: Asɨ 14.15 Jer 51.33, Jol 3.13, CHL 14.18, 16.17 dɨ ciaŋ hali hɨsɨŋ mu agaŋ aŋam ulaŋ hekɨlɨ iahua Asɨ dɨ haiabɨla hɨni agadɨ vala ivave uami. Ivavevɨla hulaŋ avɨli susu hɨvɨ mɨgahɨni agadɨ ula ula abi uami. Sɨmɨŋ fɨli hɨniavi agɨlaŋ ci mɨdɨ lɨhuavi aba abi uami. Iabi sɨmɨŋ agɨladɨ ihalahalaha mɨhiŋ agaŋ ci iahi aba abi uami. Puia nadɨ human hɨvɨ hɨni agadɨ hɨvɨ sɨmɨŋ mɨdɨ lɨhuavi agɨladɨ ihalahɨha aba abi uami.
